features: 【Stunning & Loud Sound】Compact yet powerful, the Zealot S32 parlantes bluetooth features a powerful driver with amplifer for clear sound with booming bass. Dual pairing for a 20w loud stereo aduio experience. （1，Turn on 2 S32 speakers; 2, double click - button on either of them to connect; 3, connect it with your phone & play music）

【Extend Playtime】 With a large and quality battery of 2500mAh, it can provide a long music pleasure time of up to 12 hours（50% volume for light music) in a full charge. Immersive yourself with S32 bluetooth speakers portable wireless. Perfect gift for friends/families.

【Portable Bluetooth Speaker】 Zealot Outdoor Speaker is as stylish as they come. Cylindrical cavity design make it nice & sleek, the compact design maximizes portability. Toss it in a backpack, hang it on handlebar with strap.Enjoy music everywhere at home.
【All Play Ways】 This mini wirelessspeaker support muiltple playmodes as you can imagine: Bluetooth/ Flash drives/ Micro SD card(32G MAX)/ AUX jack line-in. Never miss a good tone anywhere.

【Built-in HD Microphone】 Need to make a call? No problem, S32 can ensure a quality calls with its nosie cancelling speakerphone. It's prefect for indoor or outdoor use: gym, office, working or reading, fishing, hiking, yoga, ect. You're not alone with this small thing.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ZEALOT Portable Bluetooth Speaker IPX5 USB /TF Card Playmode NOTICE Sepaker can only reconginze music in MP3/WAV format. If there're other format file(eg: PPT, EXCEL,Words.etc)or folders in USB, speaker won't be able to read them.

Loud & Stereo Sound with You Dual pairing deliver an impressive audio effect If 1 of 2 speakers was connected individually to your deivce before first stereo pairing, Please remove the previous link on your device before stereo pairing.

Previous page Take it anywhere Portable size with loud stereo sound Handheld size make it perfect for all occasions. You can enjoy music anytime, anywhere as you want. Better exprience Immersive music experience Relax yourself with crystal clear sound by zealot speaker Wireless Speaker Bluetooth 5.0 for stable connection Easy & fast connection is ensured by a quality bluetooth chip. Enjoy music in your way Find your way of comfort Bluetooth/ TF card(no floder! MP3/ WAV foramt)/ USB/ 3.5mm audio jack 4 playmodes avaliable. Next page 1 Compact Size 2 Loud Clear Audio 3 Bluetooth 5.0 4 More Playmodes

A MUST NOTICE!! You need to delete its previous link on your device before trying to make the stereo pairing. Step 1 Turn on 2 speakers by ON/OFF button. Step 2 Click twice minus button on either one of them, once ringtone sounded, they connected successfully. Step 3 Turn on bluetooth on your device, searching and connect: ZEALOT-S32, then you can play music from 2 speakers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Looks good, works great 👍. Essy to use and connected right away. Sound is very good. Light weight and perfect size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It can take some abuse
reviews.reviewText: So I had this speaker for over a month now and I use it for work. Just about 8 hours a day it will stay on and majority of the time it will be on max volume. There was only one speaker that didn’t blow that I used to have but I lost it and I’ve gotten replacements and they all blew out fairly quick. This speaker has not once distorted or messed up in any way. I have my equalizer set for more deeper bass and this little thing can handle it like a champ. I’m in love with this speaker and especially for the price you cannot beat it. Videos don’t do it justice with the sound quality. Hard hitting bass songs will rattle the speaker which is cool lol I like it. They said you can pair two with it and my goal is to get another so I can have two and make a little enclosure on it for work. I don’t think the wattage does any difference for these little guys. I had 20w and 40w Bluetooth speakers and they sound about the same but with thump. This is well worth it. Not too big not too small. I work fixing up buildings and it fills the rooms quite nice, 2 would fill it up even better though. But yeah I waited to write a review just to see how long it would last at the workplace and it’s held up really well. I recommend it, especially for the price this quality is really good. I mean unless you wanna probably pay over 100 or something so be it but this speaker is pretty nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fairly simple to use, pretty basic, no shuffle feature, compact size, did exactly what I bought it for, (thumbdrive) and not disappointed. Perfect sound for my Teensy Rpod. I recommend this speaker. ( not endorsed whatsoever, just really like the speaker)!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have been using it to play Christmas music from a flash drive- very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great. I’m on the top floor and this is perfect for what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bass and overall sound.
reviews.reviewText: The sound is incredible for such a small device. I bought a second one in black after buying the first one in blue. Both sound great. Top (silver part) actually vibrates if you are playing music with a lot of bass sounds. One HUGE thing I discovered is that if you have music downloaded to a thumb drive (this is why I purchased this particular speaker because it allows you to play music from a thumb drive)... is that the music you download MUST be recorded as MP3 format. This assumes you are 'old school' and have a lot of music still on CD's that you have transfered to a thumb drive. If you download your CD via Windows Media Player make sure you go to 1. Tools, 2. Options 3. Rip Music - pull down option arrow and stop at MP3. 4. Hit 'okay'. Now you are set! If the music you download is on another format (ie, not MP3) it may show on your thumb drive listing, but it will not play in this stereo. I think this is why there were some comments about the stereo 'not working'. Again.. love this stereo player. Well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars One thing ruins this otherwise nice device
reviews.reviewText: The thing that ruins this product for me is when you turn it on there is a voice at MAXIMUM volume saying some word I never figured out. For poolside use that's fine but for bedtime quiet use use it is so grating I resist using it at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sound Quality and Battery
reviews.reviewText: The portable speaker has a solid sound quality, delivering clear and loud audio. I really like the design and even with that size the battery life is long lasting. Overall, it's a solid choice for its portability and sound quality.
Me gusto mucho el diseño ademas de que su sonido es muy bueno trae buen bajo me parece muy buena bocina y muy económica. También es muy fácil vincular dos bocinas al mismo tiempo.

reviews.reviewTitle: A great value for your buck 😁
reviews.reviewText: For a small speaker this sure does pack a punch ! Very loud and the option of using blue tooth or a USB card or micro SD card is also an awesome perk too well worth the purchase I highly recommend this product

reviews.reviewTitle: Great mobile speaker to play your USB recorded music
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for a great sounding mobile speaker and one that will play your recorded music of your USB drive this is the one for you. Arrived in good condition & as advertised.

reviews.reviewerName: La verdad esperaba mejor sonido. Si tiene un volumen alto pero no me convenció.
reviews.reviewText: El sonido no es el que esperaba.

Still quite new, but this thing works great! Sounds as good as many higher priced ones I've heard.Glad I bought it.EDIT: I still think it works great and happy I bought it. My one comment would be the loudness of the voice when you turn it on. It's very loud. Much louder than the music that you'd play.
